phrases: Do not touch me with your right hand!
This is the last cherry bomb I have.
I will hold it in your place, Nice, and set it off with care.
If they resist, kill them.
Ennis, you are kidding, right?
E-Ennis!
What?!
I am not too sure about the man, but the woman is all right.
I thought he was just common scum, but he is something else.
Do not you think so?
Now then,
I promised that I would kill the one who survived,
but it is not clear whether he is alive or dead.
What do you think I should do?
Is this Huey guy your sweetheart?
Family?
Your father?
Is it true that he is immortal?
Is that what you think?
That I might coerce Huey,
and steal away the secret of his immortal youth from him?
Is he the only family you have?
He is the only family you have got, so you want to do
whatever it takes to protect him,
am I right?
I was thinking about that...
If you and I got married, I would become that Huey guy's son.
Then, I would be a member of your family,
so that would not be an issue anymore.
You can think I am kidding if you want to, but I am serious.
Unlike your buddies in there, I will not betray you.
I will not try to pull anything like stealing the secrets of immortality from Huey, either.
After all, I do not need them.
You see, whether I have the power of immortality or not,
there is no way I am going to die.
I believe that.
So do not say anything, and believe it, too.
I am a man who will never die.
We will be coming up on a river soon.
If you are not planning on being caught by the police, jump off there.
Carve your answer to me into the roof over there.
Bye, now.
You can throw the knife at me, if you want to.
I will just dodge it.
Jacuzzi is usually a crybaby, but when he sets his mind to something,
he does not cry, no matter what.
When he got that tattoo, he did not complain about it once.
Then, why is he such a crybaby the rest of the time?
So, are you ready, tattooed boy?
Are you mad, kid?!
What?
Hmm?
What is wrong?
Impossible!
I was thinking, the times when I would want to cry are sure to be
the times when I need to try my hardest, right?
So I have decided to get lots of crying out of the way, all the time.
I am going to she would the tears I would when I will want to cry the most, now,
so that when I have to try my hardest, those tears will have already dried up.
You take it from here.
Boss!
Nick, please jump off ahead of us, and join up with the recovery team.
Handy, is not it?
It is rigged to shoot a bullet when I make a fist,
and press it against someone.
Now then, I may have had a bit of an accident earlier,
but at this range, I am more than close enough to roast you.
Do you have any last words, boy?
What is this?
What kind of monster is this?!
It could not be...
Isaac- san... Miria- san...
What?
I am sorry.
Thank you.
I am really glad that I got a chance to speak to you again, at the end.
If you would be willing to do just one more favor for me,
then please, do not forget about me.
Damn it!
Stay back!
Stay back!
Stay back, damn it!
Die!
Die!
Die!
Burn!
Burn!
Burn!
Burn!
Czes- kun!
Are you all right, Czes- kun?
Stay with us!
Why...
Why do not you... eat me?
Boss...
You fool!
What do you plan to do, unarmed?!
I have got a gun...
What is that?
It keeps doing that.
Is that the enemy?
Wah!
Isaac!
What is that?!
T-This must be the Rail Tracer!
It is come to eat up what it left of Czes- kun!
Damn it, I will not let that happen!
Jacuzzi!
Nice...
Thank goodness you are safe.
I am all right.
Never mind me, we have to hurry and stop this bleeding.
Yeah, about that...
I used that new type of bomb you gave me.
We have got ourselves a real treasure.
Jacuzzi...
You know what, Nice?
Maybe I have cried a bit too much before.
So, for all that I have cried too much,
I am going to say that I have been crying your share, too.
Since I have done your crying for you, Nice,
no matter what hardships you have from now on, do not you cry.
Jacuzzi!
I knew this would be coming.
I made several others before you, after all,
and as soon as they got too much knowledge, they turned on me.
I will not kill you quickly.
I am going to make you suffer abundantly.
Hey, you!
What have you done to Ennis?!
What have you done?!
Why, you...
That is something I would like to ask you, too.
Y-You are...
That hurt, you know, you dumb ass...
Guys!
Hey, Maiza, how come we are not dead?
I see, you are the ones...
you are the ones who drank it!
We have burned gloves and warehouses before...
But this is the first time we have ever burned someone is head, huh?
Please, place your right hand on that man's head!
My right hand?
Hurry!
Ennis!
Why, you...
Out of my way!
Now think in your mind that you want to eat!
Ennis...
Huh?
That red stuff is gone.
Huh?
What about Czes- kun?
Jacuzzi, who was that?
The Rail Tracer, maybe.
Jacuzzi!
Donny!
Well, what are you waiting for?
A little further...
Just reach your right hand out a little further...
Thank goodness!
Thank goodness, really!
Really!
But why are his injuries all healed?
That is easy, Miria.
Ready?
The Rail Tracer starts by gobbling up the naughty children first, right?
I am sure that after eating him, it realized that Czes is a good boy,
so it came back to return the parts it had eaten!
That is it!
That fits with what happened, huh?
You are wrong.
I have not been a good boy.
I lied to you.
You lied?
I said that I was going to New York to see my family,
but the truth is, I am just going to see an acquaintance.
I do not have any family.
I never have, and I never-
Is that right?!
Czes- kun, you really are a good boy!
You told that lie to keep us from worrying about you!
And yet, Czes- kun, you are the one who is worst off of all of us!
Czes- kun, you are an incredibly good boy!
Um...
All right, you just leave it to Isaac!
Good for you, Czes- kun!
You can rest easy, once Isaac takes charge!
So it is okay for you to smile now.
Hey!
Isaac- san!
Miria- san!
Czes- kun!
I have a favor to ask.
It looks like I am about to die,
so would you eat me, as well?
What kind of nonsense is that?
Oh, I still have so much I wanted to tell Isaac and Miria.
So, please, eat me, and give them a message from me.
If you have got something to say, say it yourself.
It is strange.
I knew the way to save you.
That is right.
You have got all of Szilard's knowledge now.
Eating that old coot was worth it.
My name is Firo.
What is yours?
Ennis.
Why ask?
You must already know it.
I just wanted to hear you say it.
Whoo!
Whoo!
What are you laughing at?
Whoo!
Whoo!
Isaac- san, Miria- san, you, too?
How about telling me where Dallas Genoard is?
Are you awake?
What is this?!
How are you still alive?!
Who knows?
According to what Firo said,
we have the same sort of immortal bodies that you do.
Unfortunately, however, unlike you, he says we will not die of old age.
With that in mind, I would like you all
to accept responsibility for what you have done.
Hey, hey, hey!!
You are going to be drowned indefinitely at the bottom of the Hudson River.
I wanted to rub you out for good all at once,
but since you do not die from being shot or clobbered, what can I do?
Keith, that is nice of you.
You are going to have a lot of free time at the bottom of the river
before you die of the infirmity of old age, so there is a parting gift for you.
That is awful... that is so awful!
I do not mean to disagree with you,
but your older brother killed our men without pity.
Here in this room, one year ago.
As such, we will not apologize.
We will only offer our sincerest condolences.
That is all we can do.
The Hudson River, huh?
If you have disposed of him, then I am free to pick him up, right?
Yes, but should not his relative have first claim?
What do you intend to do with my brother?
Examine him, comprehensively, in a certain laboratory I have.
Then you will bring my brother back up?
Yeah.
It should release him from the suffering
of continuously drowning forever.
Will you allow me to see him?
It is a promise.
Please go after my brother.
Eve- chan, are you sure?
That man is the one responsible for the deaths in your family!
If this sounds like I am making excuses, so be it,
but Raymond and Geoffrey were not killed on my orders.
This man here did it all on his own.
Boss...
It is you, is not it, Boss?
You came to rescue-
Does that somewhat help to demonstrate the way things are?
I want to show my brother that there are such things as miracles.
If I rescue him from the hell of the river bottom,
I think my brother will realize that.
Pardon the intrusion, Gandor.
Eve- chan!
Oh!
Ennis, Firo, and Maiza!
Long time no see, my fine fellows!
I am so glad to see you are all doing so well!
Oh yeah, Ennis!
This boy's name is Czes- kun!
That is right, Ennis!
Let this boy be your younger brother!
That would be great!
This is our gift!
Especially for you!
Hello.
Hello.
Czes...
Maiza...
I came to this city in order to devour this man.
Does this mean these two know each other, Miria?
I am sure that is it, Isaac.
Czes- kun said he was coming here to see an acquaintance.
He is here.
Now he is going to put his right hand on my head, and try to devour me.
Devour him before he does!
Go on, stick your right hand out toward Maiza!
What is he doing?
It is a trick.
He is pretending to be considerate,
but it is a scheme to devour me at his leisure afterward...
It is all right, Czes.
Do not be fooled!
It is all right.
Just like it used to be.
It is already set in motion...
Maiza...
I could not ever go back to that ship...
I have missed you!
I have missed you, Maiza!
Firo...
Maiza- san, I understand everything.
Firo...
In that case, I do not need to say it.
You, of all people...
What is the matter, Maiza- san?
To have given the agony of living forever to all of you...
What are you talking about, Maiza- san?
None of us mind one bit.
We would rather not die.
We feel like saying yahoo!
I am not sure I really get it, but yahoo!
Yahoo!
Cheer up, Maiza!
As long as they do not say anything, the boss and Yaguruma- san
can pass themselves off as just being long-lived!
What are you talking about, Firo?
In celebration of the birth of a new capo,
cheers!
Cheers!
Here you go, here you go.
Here you go.
We have been invited to attend such a happy event, and all.
This is the least we can do to thank them.
Gretto, is this right?
I had noticed, but I ended up not stopping them.
They would be able to make their way through it.
That is more or less what I was thinking.
Oh, well.
I will be waiting for you in Manhattan.
I will wait for you forever.
Please, please, find me.
I will also try to find you.
Manhattan, she says.
That is too large a scale.
Besides, I never told her my name.
Well, it will have to wait until after I have fulfilled my duties to the Gandor brothers,
but I will find you.
I promise.
That makes a whole lot of children that have been saved, Miria!
From harmful radio waves, huh, Isaac?
Yeah!
According to the British Sun or Nature, whichever it was,
conversation is disappearing among families because of radio waves from cell phones.
Children are involved in gaming, fathers find outside lovers,
and mothers are going off to work.
It is the breakdown of the family, huh?
Yeah!
And so, we are going to stop it!
And fight child depopulation, huh?
By the way, Miria...
What, Isaac?
I have got this feeling, like we have not aged at all.
Am I imagining things?
You are right!
Miria!
Isaac!
I do not know why this has happened to us,
but does this mean that we are being constantly reborn anew?!
Refreshed!
Like every day is our birthday, huh?
Okay then, we have to celebrate!
Let us call everyone over, and have a party, every day!
Wow, Isaac!
Happy birthday!
